acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle immutable non annotated POJOs
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleImmutableNonAnnotatedPojos

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.ImmutableNonAnnotatedPojo
Then the Pojo <span class='step-parameter'>ImmutableNoHierarchicalPojo [intField=-1415263579 should not be null
Then the int field should not be zero
Then the calendar object should not be null
Then the Date object should not be null
Then the long[] array should not be null or empty
The long value cannot be zero
